name: Rumble Shuffle
description:
A boxing deckbuilding game for the Mix And Game Jam 2020 with the theme Mixing Genres.

This is my first game jam ever and it was a lot of fun. Did not expect to complete it but here we are! I've attempted to combine sports and card game genres for a fun(I hope!) experience.

How to Play-
Drag cards from the bottom of the screen to the top to play a card. Decrease your opponent's stamina to 0 before yours reaches 0 to win. OR have more stamina than your opponent at the end of 12 rounds.

Strength is the amount of damage you deal.
Dexterity is the chance to counter(deal 1.5x damage!)
Fortitude is how much damage is reduced before hitting your stamina.

After three turns, the round ends and you get a choice of three options. Choose wisely, thank you for playing and best of luck!
